abstract: After overseeing the rising fortunes of the Xbox 360 game console, Peter Moore will run the sports division of the leading game publisher.
snippet: After overseeing the rising fortunes of the Xbox 360 game console, Peter Moore will run the sports division of the leading game publisher.
lead_paragraph: Shaking up the highest ranks of the video game business, Electronic Arts, the No. 1 game publisher, said today that it had lured Peter Moore, head of Microsoft’s games business, to run its large but sluggish sports division.

headline.main: Microsoft Game Chief Moves to Electronic Arts

abstract: Momentum is building for the Wii from Nintendo among its crucial allies: game developers and publishers.
snippet: Momentum is building for the Wii from Nintendo among its crucial allies: game developers and publishers.
lead_paragraph: SANTA MONICA, Calif. — In the competition among the makers of video game consoles, momentum is building for the Wii from Nintendo among its crucial allies: game developers and publishers.

headline.main: In Battle of Consoles, Nintendo Gains Allies
headline.print_headline: In Battle Of Consoles, Nintendo Gains Allies

byline.original: By Matt Richtel and Eric A. Taub
